abilitygroupdescription.p: Represents training the ability to use war hammers in combat. This includes the use of two handed warhammers, single handed hammers and throwing hammers. Warhammers tend to be designed as armour piercing weapons.

abilitydescription.p: Characters equipped with a hammer can use the hammer to "smash" a humanoid opponent hitting them and pushing them back. If the attack roll hits and is a boon the target takes double damage and is also knocked prone and stunned if they fail their save.. If the attack roll hits and is a bane then the target takes half damage. If the attack misses and a boon is rolled then the attacker still manages to force the defender back. If the attack misses and a bane is rolld then the attacked must save or be knocked prone.

ability.abilitydmg: Weapon + Strength|Endurance, and Target saves verses Agility DC 12 + Level or is knocked back

abilitydescription.p: Characters equipped with an Hammer can strike with it during combat doing weapon damage.
